name: PONG (itch) (Cooling Puppet)
description:
Pong is one of the earliest arcade video games. It  was created by Allan Alcorn as a training exercise assigned to him by Nolan Bushnell, the co-founder of Atari.

It's a remake of the classic for everyone to enjoy.

How to Play:

  • In "Player Vs  AI"  mode use W and  S keys to move the paddle.
  • In "Player Vs Player" mode W and S to mode Blue paddle and Up and Down keys to move red paddle.
